DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of K-604 for the treatment of atherosclerosis.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial of the Safety and Efficacy of K-604 for the Treatment of Atherosclerosis
DOC.criteria: moderate carotid artery stenosis history of arteritis heavily calcified plaque uncontrolled hypertension poorly controlled diabetes hypercholesterolemia
